Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Rogers/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Damen/87th
ShortDescription: #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Western, 83rd and Damen into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Damen/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Western, 83rd and Damen into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Damen/87th.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Sox-35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Sox-35th. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Sox-35th due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses are requested between Roosevelt and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: 

  • #47 47th
  • #29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
